I am an impartial observer here but oops oh no I have accidentally copy/pasted a remark from commenter Oli Baba, who said "Rewards upfront is one of the coolest mechanics to grace gaming and seems to be losing only because so few people have come across it." Whoops, I really must fix those hotkeys. Next, I ask you to choose between cooly saying nothing, or being told how cool you are. What's better: a silent protagonist, or combat style ratings?
Read more
articles.title: What's better: A silent protagonist, or combat style ratings?

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
Tonight is Sony's PlayStation Showcase stream, an event that promises to have plenty of cool news and announcements as only a big, early NotE3 presentation can. While I'm sure the majority of tonight's announcements won't have an immediate and direct impact on us over in PC town, it's well known that Sony have been stepping up their PC game recently, and so a lot of what you see here will probably make the jump eventually, even if it's several years down the line. So come and join us for an early glimpse of PC's possible future. I'll be liveblogging tonight's proceedings, which kick off at 9pm BST / 1pm PDT. See you there!
 Read more
articles.title: Everything announced at Sony's PlayStation Showcase 2023, in liveblog form

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Small form factor (SFF) PCs are definitely in right now. I've built my fair share over the past few years, but new models continue to come into the market offering impressive looks, thermals, buildability for their size. One recent release is the Asus AP201, a Micro ATX case that offers excellent cooling potential, a stylish, unshowy appearance and a very reasonable price - especially today, as the black and white versions of this SFF case have dropped to $70 on Newegg following a $15 discount. 
Read more
articles.title: This $70 Micro ATX case is the perfect start to your SFF PC build

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Logitech make some of the best peripherals in the business, including some of my favourite keyboards. I normally prefer mechanical fare here, but their MX Keys low profile scissor switch keyboard is the exception. It provides a full-size UK layout, pleasant typing experience and long battery life when connected via 2.4GHz wireless or Bluetooth. It's normally at its £120 RRP, or close to it, but today you can pick it up for £81 - the lowest we've seen it since January.  
Read more
articles.title: Logitech's low profile MX Keys wireless keyboard is down to £81 at Amazon UK

articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.description:
Update: Ubisoft have confirmed that Assassin’s Creed Mirage’s will arrive on October 12th, with a lengthy new trailer shown during this evening's PlayStation Showcase. I've embedded the new trailer below.
Read more
articles.title: Assassin's Creed Mirage comes out October 12th, now confirmed

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Well then. Mere minutes after Nvidia hit the launch button on the GeForce RTX 4060 Ti, AMD rocked up with a new 1080p graphics card of their own: the Radeon RX 7600. Though it’s likely more of an RTX 4060 rival, given the RX 7600 will go on sale tomorrow – May 25th – at £260 / $269, slightly less than the $299-tagged 4060.
Based on the same RDNA 3 architecture as the Radeon RX 7900 XT and RX 7900 XTX, the RX 7600 nonetheless targets a much more widely-used monitor resolution than those 4K-minded GPU hulks. Which makes a nice change, and means AMD will beat Nvidia’s RTX 40 series to the punch on a sub-£300 GPU, with the RTX 4060 not set for release until July.
Read more
articles.title: AMD announce the Radeon RX 7600, an RDNA 3 graphics card for slick 1080p

articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.description:
This month, Amazon were already giving away 15 games to all Amazon Prime subscribers, but they’ve now sweetened the pot with 8 more, including some real good indies up for keeps. The new additions are available to claim starting today, up until June 26th - giving you a little over a month to grab the lineup below. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Amazon Prime Gaming adds more freebies to the May line-up including Turnip Boy and Calico

articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.description:
I’ve lost countless seconds, minutes, maybe even hours to those TikTok videos showing off ludicrous marble runs. Strangers decorate their houses with mini slopes and sliding paths, they record their marbles rolling down these elaborate courses, and then they’re posted online for strangers like me to mindlessly enjoy. I’ve now spent the last few nights building my own marble runs - not in real life, because I’m too lazy for the cleanup after - in Zen Marbles, a free playable prototype, out now. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Build comfy marble runs in this free indie prototype

articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.description:
Update: Yep, the rumours are true. Konami have announced a remake of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater, sorry, Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater, and it's coming to PC as well as consoles. Little else is known about it right now, but it will feature: "The same gripping story and engrossing world, but now with cutting-edge graphics and 3D audio, which bring the jungle to life," according to Konami's website. They also announced a rerelease collection of MGS 1, 2, and 3.
Read more
articles.title: Rumours of a Metal Gear Solid 3 remake are confirmed at tonight's PlayStation Showcase

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
I’m sure you’re all bored of reading about how about how expensive RTX 40 series graphics cards are; I’m certainly bored of writing about it. Thank the Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti for its mercy, then – assuming you can find one at RRP,  it’s the first of its family not to plonk a price premium over the last-gen equivalent. And even though it’s only moderately faster than the RTX 3060 Ti in most games, its efficiency improvements and DLSS 3 support ensure the RTX 4060 Ti keeps some crowd pleasing potential.
Read more
articles.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 Ti review: the big middle of graphics cards

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
I always knew I would one day be tempted to return to Destiny 2. After three years and several thousands hours of playtime, last February I hit my limit on the garbage MMO that this phenomenal FPS is trapped inside and uninstalled. But I still adore parts, including its striking sci-fi landscapes. So when I heard the latest season was returning to the alien ocean moon of Titan, one of my favourite spots, I was tempted. Oh I was tempted! But now Season Of The Deep started yesterday and Titan is here and no, it's not enough.
Read more
articles.title: Even a return to Titan can't bring me back to Destiny 2

articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.description:
Sega have laid off 121 employees working at Relic Entertainment, the studio behind Age Of Empires 4 and the Company Of Heroes series. Today's news comes three months after the studio released Company Of Heroes 3, although Sega points to the “external factors [that] are challenging our industry” as one reason behind the job cuts.

 
Read more
articles.title: Sega announces 121 job cuts at Company Of Heroes studio Relic Entertainment

articles.author: Jon Bailes
articles.description:
Swedish developers The Bearded Ladies certainly have a type. If you’ve played the memorably odd Mutant Year Zero or the largely forgettable Corruption 2029, you’ll know it by now – a blend of real-time stealth and turn-based tactics, where you quietly pick off stragglers from enemy squads before confronting the rest in a team scrap. Now here’s Miasma Chronicles, the Ladies’ third effort, and let’s just say they’re clearly happy to stick with what they know.
While the patterns of play are to a great extent the same, though, Miasma Chronicles is a more ambitious project. Addressing criticisms that those earlier games weren’t substantial enough, it’s a broader, denser beast, in which you could easily spend twice as long – 30 hours or so – seeing all the sights and shooting the nasties that populate them. That means there’s a lot more space available for this game to coax out varied strategies and introduce more elements, which is great. But it also means the weaker elements of the formula are left more exposed, which isn’t.
Read more
articles.title: Miasma Chronicles review: this tactically sound turn-based post-apocalypse is short on fresh ideas

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
WD's SN770 SSD is one of the very best value options on the market, combining a PCIe 4.0 interface, sequential read speeds up to 5150MB/s and an aggressive pricing strategy that makes it extremely affordable to add to your PC or PS5. Today this drive has dropped to a new low on Amazon UK, where a 1TB model will cost you £43.99 and the 2TB size is just £99.98. Either way, you're getting a great value SSD that performs impressively for gaming. 
Read more
articles.title: WD's Black SN770 PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD is down to £43.99 for a 1TB size

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Blue Protocol is an anime MMO with some gorgeous environment art. It looks like the kind of game I'd ignore right up until the moment when I wake up and discover it's the most popular game in the world. That day will have to wait a while longer, though. Developer Bandai Namco and publisher Amazon Games have announced that its western release has been delayed until 2024.

 
Read more
articles.title: Anime MMO Blue Protocol's western release has been pushed into 2024

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Much maligned action-adventure Forspoken gets DLC this Friday. Before that, Square Enix have released a patch for the base game which, among other things, adjusts the "frequency and content of the banter" between Frey and her magical pal Cuff.

 
Read more
articles.title: Forspoken patch adjusts "frequency and content" of banter ahead of DLC release

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
F1 Manager 2023 will cross the finish line this summer. Frontier announced the motorsport simulation sequel earlier today, with a trailer and promises that the new game would feature "deeper management systems, more dramatic racing, and an even greater commitment to authenticity."

 
Read more
articles.title: F1 Manager 2023 coming this summer with more motorsport simulation

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Final Fantasy 14's patch 6.4 is out now. "The Dark Throne", as it's called, continues the MMO's main story, adds a new dungeon, raid and trials, and adds new furnishing to the Island Sanctuary. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Final Fantasy XIV's patch 6.4 is out now, with new story quests and outdoor furniture

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Intel's Arc series of GPUs has continued to improve following the launch of the A750 and A770 last year, and now these RTX 3060 competitors have hit a new low price point in the US: $199.99 at Newegg. 
That's an awesome deal for an 8GB graphics card that delivers excellent RT performance for its tier, AV1 encoding/decoding and a solid upscaling solution in XeSS. If you're in the market for a GPU that can handle 1080p gaming with a relatively modern motherboard that supports the Resizeable BAR feature, this is an awesome pickup for the money. 
Read more
articles.title: Intel's Arc A750 beats the RTX 3060 - and is $200 at Newegg

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
The next Total War game will be taking players to the Egyptian New Kingdom period, Sega and Creative Assembly have announced today, with the reveal of Total War: Pharaoh. Releasing in October 2023, Total War: Pharaoh will see the three great cultures of the people of Egypt, Canaan and Hittite battle it out as they determine who will be the next pharaoh. And it's all set against the backdrop of the Bronze Age collapsing in on itself, with natural disasters to plan for, foreign powers to defend against, and the general unravelling of society as we know it. Lovely stuff. Come watch the reveal trailer below.
Read more
articles.title: Total War's next stop is Ancient Egypt with Total War: Pharaoh

articles.author: Caelyn Ellis
articles.description:
Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun is possibly one of the most perfectly named games in history. The first bit lets you know you’re playing a game set in the venerable Warhammer 40,000 tabletop universe, while the second bit tells you everything else you need to know. What kind of game is it? Boltgun. What’s the gameplay like? Boltgun! What’s the story? BOLTGUN! Okay, there is technically a story, but it’s a thin excuse to let you shoot crunchy Chaos things in 40k, and shooting things in 40k means BOLTGUN!!!
Boltgun is a retro-styled first-person shooter, or boomer shooter, to use the parlance of our times. Cast as a Space Marine, one of 40k’s genetically engineered fascist super soldiers, it’s your job to secure the Plot Device and prevent 40k’s already crappy Imperium from getting even crappier. As you can probably guess, this means running around at incredible speeds and shooting hordes of cultists, traitors and daemons in the face until they fall down, explode into chunks of bright red gore, or both.
Read more
articles.title: Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun review: gloriously maximalist shooting and sawing in the 41st millennium

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
I've said it before, but I really keep meaning to play Ctrl Alt Ego. Released last year, it's a sci-fi immersive sim built all around classic abilities of the genre: remote control and possession. You bounce your digital consciousness between robots and devices and ach, I hear it's great. I've bought it. I've installed it. I've played the first part of the tutorial. And then, who knows. One day. One day very soon. But right now, for people who have played it, good news: a free update has added a Sandbox mode generating squillions of new levels.
Read more
articles.title: Indie immersive sim Ctrl Alt Ego adds a Sandbox mode generating new levels

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
For whatever reason, I'm quite good at reading physical books, but when presented with a visual novel game my attention span slumps. "It's not you, it's me", rings true here, as it's definitely not the fault of the video games. I trust that Phoenix Wright or Paranormasight are brilliant, but the sudden act of having to read lots in a game has never worked out for me.
Then Citizen Sleeper came along for this month's RPS Game Club - and I think I'm a changed man? I think I now get why people are excited about static images and dialogue boxes. And I'm certain it's the game's cyclic nature that's managed to lasso my brain and keep it focused on the task at hand: help an AI trapped in a vending machine.
Read more
articles.title: Citizen Sleeper is perfect for visual novel novices

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
After giving us an early glimpse of its unstoppable raptor hordes in a closed beta test last summer, Capcom recently let us loose with the opening hours of their upcoming dinosaur multiplayer shooter, Exoprimal. Its final release isn't far away now - its July 14th launch fast becoming the sole highlight of an otherwise desolate month - and I was excited to finally play the game that RPS vid bud Liam literally hasn't been able to stop talking about ever since he first clapped eyes (and his thumbs) on its somersaulting T-Rexes. (You should also read his excellent interview with the devs while you're at it, too). 
I'll hold my hands up now and say I didn't get to play as much of Exoprimal as I would have liked, but the handful of missions I did play really are as daft and brilliant as Liam described last year. I won't waste time repeating its fundamentals (you can read them here), but the basic setup is thus: in a world plagued by dinosaurs that periodically pour out of strange portals for some reason, you play a rookie dino hunter that gets pulled into a time-looping wargame set up by your company's clearly psychotic AI called Leviathan. In order to gather valuable 'combat data' for its simulations to fight said dinosaur threat, Leviathan endlessly ropes you and other rookie exosuit wearers into deadly feats of speed and skill. It's a neat, if patently preposterous setup for its 5v5 PvP multiplayer missions, but the thing that struck me most wasn't its gloriously silly dinosaurs or Leviathan's perfectly pitched ham lines. It was its bot companions, because heck, they're great to play with, but absolute fiends if you're on the wrong side of them.
Read more
articles.title: Forget Exoprimal's dinosaurs and evil AI, the real villains are its surprisingly capable bots

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
It's no secret that Sony have been making increasing efforts to bring their exclusive PlayStation games to PC over the last couple of years, but one thing they've never quite been clear about is when we can expect to see them. They said a few years ago that we obviously shouldn't expect a simultaneous launch release, but some such as Death Stranding and The Last Of Us Part 1 have taken as little as six to eight months to come across, while others such as Spider-Man and Uncharted 4 have taken several years. 
According to PlayStation boss Jim Ryan, though, data from fans seem to suggest that the only "acceptable" route from a player point of view is a wait of two to three years. Outrageous, I say, but also: surely that means the long-sought-after Bloodborne must be next in line, right? Surely. It's been eight years, come on now. 
Read more
articles.title: If PlayStation fans are only happy with PC releases taking place 2-3 years later, surely Bloodborne must be next, yeah?

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
Final Fantasy 16 producer Naoki Yoshida has said he thinks "Maybe it's time we removed the numbers" from Final Fantasy games. In an interview with GQ, he talked about the baggage that inevitably comes with having a 35-year-old series with soon to be 16 numbered mainline games in it (not including the sequels and spin-offs, I might add), and the confusion it continues to create with new players. "Every numbered title we release in the series, we have to go into it like, 'It's OK, you don't have to play the rest of them,'" he said, and removing them is "something that I've discussed with the higher-ups". It's an understandable problem, for sure, although I think I'd be quite sad to see the numerals go entirely. As long as they don't pull a Mortal Kombat and go back to 1, though, we're good. 
Read more
articles.title: Could Final Fantasy 16 be the last numbered Final Fantasy game?

articles.author: Kim Armstrong
articles.description:
I bark and the humans obey, jumping, turning, floating into the great unknown. I am leading them toward something good, the orbs tell me. Something that grows stronger with every trial this endless parade of humanity completes. 
Humanity is a VR-optional flowy puzzle platformer in which you, an ethereal shiba inu made of pure light, lead mindless hoards of “the people” into the light because a glowing orb told you to make it happen. Oh, and don’t worry if most of them end up marching off a ledge into the endless void below–those physical bodies are mere constructs and their minds will return to follow you again.


A̷̰͙̙͚͓̱̗n̮̲̣d̹͖͚̠ ̜̹a͏͇̱͙͈g͔̘͍̟a͍i̲͖̥̺͓n͘.̮̮͕̼̰ 


Ą͠͡nḑ̷҉ ̀͘à̧̛g̢͢ai̸͏n̡̛.̨͜͜ 



 
Read more
articles.title: Humanity review: perfect puzzles pumped with existential hot air

articles.author: Liam Richardson
articles.description:
Last july I was given the opportunity to play an early beta for Exoprimal, Capcom’s upcoming multiplayer shooter that pits you and a bunch of your mech suit-wearing buddies against unstoppable raptor hordes. In the nine months since I took command of a T-Rex and did a sick backflip, my life has not known peace. “I’m really excited to play Exoprimal” I’ll say to colleagues, unprompted, in important meetings unrelated to anything prehistoric in nature. “From what I've played, it blends PvE and PvP gameplay into a single multiplayer mode that feels very unique and hugely entertaining”. My tax return was voided because I drew a big stegosaurus on it. I have renamed the cat “Sniper Neosaur”, and I am disappointed that she has yet to emerge from a gooey purple orb.


It was my delight, then, to be given the opportunity to sit down with key members of the game’s development team to discuss Exoprimal’s inspirations, its inevitable comparisons to Dino Crisis and how Capcom plans to use it as a template for their live-service games moving forward. Alongside a fresh opportunity to check out the game, I hopped onto a Zoom call with Exoprimal’s director Takuro Hiraoka, technical director Kazuki Abe and art director Takuro Fuse.

 
Read more
articles.title: Exoprimal devs tell us how they pushed for thousands of onscreen dinosaurs, and why it bears no relation to Dino Crisis

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
In today's Forza Horizon 5 livestream, developers Playground Games offered details of the open-world racer's free "Explore The Horizon" update. It'll launch tomorrow and includes six new cars, new photo mode features, and new pathfinder challenges.

 
Read more
articles.title: Forza Horizon 5 update adds new cars, overlanding modifications and photo mode features

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Inkbound is a co-op turn-based roguelike, a jumble of genres I've seen so many times in the past decade they no longer conjure any feelings for me. It's also from the developers of Monster Train, however, the uncommonly good card game about stopping an onslaught aboard a multi-storey train to hell. That pedigree means it's worth noting that Inkbound is now in early access.

 
Read more
articles.title: Inkbound, from Monster Train's developers, is in early access now

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Right now you can pick up a great deal on a powerful RTX 4070 Ti gaming PC over at CCL, equipped with a Core i5 12400F processor, 16GB DDR4-3200 RAM, an MSI Pro B660M-E motherboard and 1TB Kingston NV2 NVMe SSD - all for £1260. That's an awesome spec for gaming at 1080p, 1440p and even 4K - such is the power of this mighty GPU!  
To get this price, plus two freebies - a copy of Diablo 4 (£60) and a gaming headset (£30) - select the "No OS" option and use code GAMER40 at the checkout. 
You can of course opt to get Windows preinstalled if you prefer, but you can also use a USB stick and any unused Windows keys you've already got, including those from previous versions of Windows, to install the OS yourself. And, as the Steam Deck proves, gaming on Linux is getting pretty damn good - and of course, Linux is completely free (as in beer and as in speech). 
Read more
articles.title: Grab an RTX 4070 Ti gaming PC for £1260 with Diablo 4 and a free headset

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
China's antitrust regulator has approved Microsoft's $69 billion acquisition of Activision Blizzard. The decision follows the EU's approval of the deal last week.

 
Read more
articles.title: China has approved Microsoft's proposed acquisition of Activision Blizzard

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
For the last six years, my Skyrim wood elf has been stuck in some godforsaken cave in goodness knows what corner of Tamriel. I don't remember why they were there, or what goal they were trying to achieve. It was just 'one of those caves' that looked cool and interesting when I came across it and I thought, 'Yeah, all right, let's have a go then, shall we?' But while other Skyrim caves I'd come across could be easily polished off in an office lunch-time - as that was often how I played Skyrim back then - this one was different somehow. It was so large and twisty, so infinitely befuddling, that I seemed to be trapped down there forever. Sure, I could have probably turned back, but I'd been down there for ages, and felt like I'd come too far to simply not see it all through to the bitter end. But the end never came, and I eventually abandoned my save as a result, whisked off by the prospect of newer, more exciting games that didn't involve trying to figure out how to escape its narrow, bioluminescent hellscape.
Worse still, this disastrous feat of orienteering has now become my overriding memory of Skyrim. For all its great sidequests and its ever-increasing number of excellent mods, all I ever think about are its damn caves. Just the thought of loading up that save file again makes me grimace, and I'm starting to dread the thought of getting stuck in another one whenever the heck The Elder Scrolls 6 comes out. But I've been playing a lot of The Legend Of Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom this past week, and cor, I'm immediately jealous of Link's Ascend ability. As part of his new slate of powers, Ascend lets him instantly woosh through almost any ceiling as long as there's a traversable bit of terrain above it. That kind of power wouldn't have been half handy for my poor old wood elf, and it's precisely what makes exploring Tears Of The Kingdom's caves so enjoyable. So if there's one thing The Elder Scrolls 6 should steal take note of, please let it be this.
Read more
articles.title: If Elders Scrolls 6 steals one thing from Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom, it should be Link's best cheat power

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Logitech's G920 and G29 wheel and pedals sets are my go-to recommendations for aspiring racing fans, offering a noticeable improvement in control and feedback over a gamepad while costing far less than more advanced direct drive alternatives from the likes of Fanatec. Today both models are discounted to £170, a healthy discount from their usual £240 price point and more than 50% off their UK RRP - nice. 
The G920 is the Xbox-oriented model, meaning it works on PC plus Xbox Series and One consoles, while the G29 is for PC plus PS4 and PS5 - so choose what's most useful to you!  
Read more
articles.title: Get Logitech's perfect starter racing wheel and pedals for 50% off in the UK

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
Alan Wake 2 has yet to receive an official release date from developers Remedy Entertainment, but according to the voice actor playing its titular, torch-bearing thriller writer, we can apparently expect it to arrive sometime this October. So far, Remedy have only committed to a general 2023 release for Alan Wake 2, but voice actor Matthew Porretta told the Monsters, Madness And Magic podcast that it's "supposed to come out in October". That means it should be well clear of ye olde Starfield, but that "supposed to" also suggests the date isn't set in stone yet. Here's hoping we get a more formal date at this year's Summer Games Fest, perhaps. 
Read more
articles.title: Alan Wake 2 is "supposed to come out in October" apparently

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
Every weekend, indie devs show off current work on Twitter's #screenshotsaturday tag. And every Monday, I bring you a selection of these snaps and clips. The difficulties of writing a column reliant upon a collapsing platform continue to be felt in a week when the #screenshotsaturday tag became overrun with spambots, but the games still shone through. This week, my eye was caught by colourful driving experiences in run 'n' guns and visual novels, multiple terrible squiggly beasts from horror games, a cute N64-style platformer, and lots more attractive and interesting indie games. Come see!
Read more
articles.title: Screenshot Saturday Mondays: Neon nights and horrible squiggly beasts

articles.author: Rachel Watts
articles.description:
Planet of Lana has all the hallmarks of a story-rich platformer. Across its six-hour run time, you'll encounter a string of environmental puzzles, an evil plan concocted by a group of baddies, a rich orchestral soundtrack that swells at all the right moments, a cute animal companion, and a gorgeous world that needs saving. 
On paper, it has everything you could possibly want from this kind of game, but in practice, it can also be Lana's undoing at times. It does everything well - admittedly some much better than others - but it feels like this sci-fi tale is missing something. That gut punch, that sigh of relief after a thrill, that unexpected surprise... You know, that extra edge to really make it sing. It’s still a very enjoyable adventure, but its lack of emotional highs means it doesn't linger long in the memory once you've seen the credits roll. Is that a roundabout way to say that Planet of Lana is a solid 7/10? Maybe, but we don't do that here.
Read more
articles.title: Planet Of Lana review: a gorgeous sci-fi tale that shoots for the stars

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
Add another one to the list of weird and delightful ways to play ye olde Doom: teletext. A new mod converts Doom to a teletext signal, letting you play the seminal shooter rendered in blocky teletext art on a telly. You can even control it with your TV remote. Have a look in the video below! I really, really like the smiley face replacing Doomguy's gurn.
Read more
articles.title: Now you can play Doom over teletext

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Beránek)
articles.description: Nástroj pre-commit je správce zásuvných modulů verzovacího systému Git. V tomto článku si ukážeme základní možnosti jeho použití, konkrétně si vyzkoušíme nastavení stejnojmenného modulu pre-commit.
articles.title: Pohodlná správa zásuvných modulů v Gitu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Dnes si představíme nástroj pro posílání intentů z lokálního počítače do mobilní aplikace, budeme sledovat kvalitu síťového připojení a vyzkoušíme průzkumníka úložišť bezpečnostních certifikátů.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (31. 5. 2023): monitoring síťového připojení a analýza sítě

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Svatopluk Vít)
articles.description: Při vytváření dokumentace k programům vám mohou výrazně pomoci aplikace, které vytvářejí diagramy popisující fungování aplikace. Hodí se ale také nástroje, které snímají reálné snímky obrazovek.
articles.title: Ksnip: multiplatformní snímač obrazovek s pokročilými funkcemi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Python je dnes pravděpodobně nejrozšířenějším programovacím jazykem, k čemuž přispěl i fakt, že pro něj existuje obrovské množství balíčků. Mnoho z nich je ve skutečnosti jen lepidlo mezi Pythonem a nativními knihovnami.
articles.title: Propojení Pythonu s nativními knihovnami s využitím balíčku cffi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CSIRT.CZ)
articles.description: V dnešním díle Postřehů se podíváme na kryptoscamy, na zenové útočníky z Play Store, na zranitelnosti v MS Outlook, Cisco Small Business či Keepassu, na IT security analytika k nezaplacení a řadu dalších zajímavostí.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: falešné investiční nabídky na vzestupu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Arch Linux dokončil migraci zdrojových kódů ze Subversion na Git. Prostředí KDE Plasma 6 nabídne základní podporu HDR. Podpora kamery IPU6 bude ve Fedoře dostupná pomocí balíčků na RPM Fusion.
articles.title: Arch Linux přešel na Git, KDE Plasma 6 s podporou HDR

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Aktualizace ovladače GPU AMD o podporu správy barev, Linux dostane opravu hybridního SMP, aby nové notebooky nedetekovat jako stroje s 11 sockety, KDE Plasma 6.0 zase noční režim na Waylandu i s GPU Nvidia.
articles.title: Intel Open Image Denoise 2.0 běží na GPU, Wine 8.9 uzavírá 17 let starou chybu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Existuje hranice výkonu PC, pod kterou už není rozumné jít. Možná leží na úrovni prvních procesorů s 3D tranzistory, 22nm Intel Ivy Bridge z roku 2012. Jak se žije s takhle starým počítačem?
articles.title: Hledání výkonnostního dna, aneb jak se žije s 11 let starým PC z výprodeje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Ukážeme si základní metody ovládání hráčů (postaviček) ve hrách, a to jak s využitím klávesnice, tak i pomocí joysticků připojených přes různá rozhraní: Kempston, Interface-2 atd.
articles.title: Ovládání hráčů ve hře klávesnicí nebo joystickem na ZX Spectru

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Ve Zlíně proběhlo setkání provozovatelů počítačových sítí a hovořilo se nejen o výkonu sítí, ale také o současných regulačních směrnicích, nakládání s informacemi o zranitelnostech či podepisování kořenové zóny.
articles.title: Bezpečnost kořenové zóny je v transparentnosti, řekl Ondřej Filip na CSNOG 2023

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Operační systém MINIX, svého času považovaný za nejpoužívanější na světě, když vyšlo najevo, že jej používá Intel v Management Engine, de facto skončil. Thom Holwerda shrnuje stav projektu v několika odstavcích, které hovoří o tom, kterak zcela ustal vývoj, zejména poté, co Andrew S. Tanenbaum odešel z projektu.
articles.title: Nejpoužívanější operační systém světa MINIX de facto skončil

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Google vydal novou verzi Chrome 114 pro Linux, Windows a macOS. Ve výchozím nastavení přichází s povolenou funkcí CHIPS, což je zkratka pro Cookies Having Independent Partitioned State, což bychom mohli česky přeložit jako cookies s nezávislým odděleným stavem.
articles.title: Chrome 114 zapíná CHIPS a testuje rozmazaná pozadí ve videu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Docker je dnes technologie, která proces vývoje, testování a provozování softwaru velmi zjednodušuje. Provozujte cokoliv a kdekoliv. Už nečekejte na nastavení svého serveru nebo na aktualizaci nějaké knihovny. Mějte prostředí jako součást vaší aplikace.
articles.title: Naučte se pracovat s Dockerem a kontejnery (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jednoduchá oprava chyby v implementaci souborového systému XFS způsobující poškození metadat, je v novém jádru Linux 6.3.5 opravena. Greg Kroah-Hartman vydal jak Linux 6.3.5, tak starší verze 5.15.114, 5.10.181, 5.4.244, 4.9.284 a 4.4.316.
articles.title: Vydán Linux 6.3.5 s opravou pro XFS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Organizátoři komunitního setkání CSNOG 2023 zveřejnili na webu prezentace a videozáznamy z letošního setkání provozovatelů počítačových sítí, které se konalo 16. a 17. května ve Zlíně. V programu akce na webu je možné najít odkazy na videa a prezentace v PDF. Z přednáškové části vznikly také dva články, které vyšly na Root.cz:
articles.title: Prezentace a videa z komunitního setkání CSNOG 2023

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jako dočasné řešení potíží s během současných verzí AAA hry Cyberpunk 2077 mění Intel výchozí nastavení svého Vulkan ovladače pro GPU typu Arc. Patch pro ovladač v Mesa ve vývojové verzi 23.2 dočasně zavádí vynucenou identifikaci skrze  force_vk_vendor.
articles.title: Aby na Intel Arc běžel Cyberpunk 2077 s XeSS, ovladač Intel Vulkan se dočasně hlásí jinak

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Tři měsíce po první beta verzi přináší tvůrci druhé testovací vydání nové verze Mageia 9. Od února povýšili kernel na verzi 6.3 (aktuálně je v repozitářích nejnovější 6.3.4), dále glibc 2.36, GCC 12.3.0, RPM 4.18.0 či Mesa 23.1.
articles.title: Mageia 9 Beta 2 přináší Linux 6.3 s KDE Plasma 5.27 či GNOME 44

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Funkce csum_partial v jádře počítá 32bitový kontrolní součet dat. Používá se ve spoustě ovladačů, v síťování a v souborových systémech. Je napsaná ručně v assembleru a Noah Goldstein poslal do jádra upravenou verzi pro x86 s lepším výkonem.
articles.title: Jádro 6.5 bude mít o 30-40 % rychlejší csum_partial na x86

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Asi před týdnem několik uživatelů nahlásilo poškození metadat na souborovém systému XFS s jádrem 6.3.3. Původně byl hlášen problém na Fedoře, ale poté i na Debianu.
articles.title: Poškození XFS s jádry 6.3 a novějšími

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: PyPI  (Python Package Index) minulý týden oznámil, že bude nově od všech majitelů projektů vyžadovat dvoufaktorové přihlašování (2FA) ke konci tohoto roku. Již téměř rok je 2FA na PyPI vyžadováno pro kritické balíčky. Jako kritických bylo označeno asi 4,5 tisíce projektů a povinnost se již rok týká asi 9,5 tisíce uživatelů.
articles.title: PyPI bude od majitelů projektů vyžadovat dvoufaktorové přihlašování

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Bcrypt je hašovací funkce, používaná například pro bezpečné uložení hesel. Je založená na šifře Blowfish. Jeden z jejích autorů Niels Provos v pondělí zveřejnil článek na serveru USENIX (Unix User Group), kde se ohlédl za 25letou historií bcryptu.
articles.title: Bcrypt po 25 letech

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Na Steamu můžete získat zdarma hru Hue (odstín). Jde o plošinovou adventuru s logickými hádankami. Ovládáte odstín pozadí a tím můžete zneškodnit nebo naopak aktivovat objekty stejného a rozdílného odstínu.
articles.title: Hra zdarma na Steamu: Hue

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Služba hCaptcha, alternativa například k Google reCAPTCHA,  je test, který má potvrdit, že je uživatel člověk (CAPTCHA, Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart). Služba hCpatcha však používá obrázky generované AI a uživatelé si stěžují, že jim nerozumí, jako například deformované AI obrázky Rubikovy kostky.
articles.title: Služba hCaptcha chce po uživatelích identifikovat neexistující objekty

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Automatizace pomocí continuous integration přímo v Gitlabu. CI vám pomůže automatizovat rutinní procesy a ušetří vám hromadu času. Pomůže vám od automatického testování, buildy po nasazování. Chcete vědět víc? Přijďte na naše školení GitLab CI, které se uskuteční 19. června. Proběhne v Praze a můžete se ho zúčastnit také online. Školí Ondřej Sika.
articles.title: Gitlab CI: automatizujte přímo v Gitlabu (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Microsoft přidává nativní podporu archivů RAR, 7-Zip a GZ do nadcházející verze systému Windows 11, která se očekává tento týden. Informace o chystaných novinkách popsal na firemním webu Panos Panay, produktový ředitel společnosti Microsoft. Přidali jsme nativní podporu pro další archivační formáty, včetně tar, 7-Zip, RAR, gz a mnoho dalších, pomocí open-source projektu libarchive.
articles.title: Systém Windows 11 získává nativní podporu pro archivy 7-Zip, RAR a GZ

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Guvernér státu Minnesota Tim Walz podepsal průlomový zákon o právu na opravu [PDF], který prošel v dubnu legislativním procesem a vstoupí v platnost 1. července 2024. Nová pravidla vyžadují, aby výrobci elektroniky umožnili nezávislým opravnám a spotřebitelům nakupovat díly a nástroje potřebné k opravě vlastních zařízení. Pravidla se však nevztahují na některé významné kategorie, včetně zemědělských zařízení, herních konzolí, zdravotnických přístrojů a motorových vozidel.
articles.title: Minnesota přijala zákon o právu na opravu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Na blogu PyPI zveřejnil Ee Durbin, ředitel infrastruktury nadace Python Software Foundation (PSF), podrobný popis reakce organizace na tři soudní obsílky, které obdržela v březnu a dubnu a které se týkaly informací o uživatelích PyPI. Všechny tři příkazy vydalo ministerstvo spravedlnosti Spojených států, které si vyžádalo informace týkající se pěti uživatelských účtů.
articles.title: Provozovatelé PyPI museli vydat soudu informace o pěti uživatelích

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Internet Security Research Group (ISRG) v těchto dnech slaví desáté narozeniny. Organizace byla založena 24. května 2013 a jejím hlavním cílem bylo vyvinout, spustit a provozovat certifikační autoritu Let's Encrypt. Zakladateli organizace jsou Eric Rescorla, Alex Halderman, Peter Eckersley a Josh Aas. Měli jsme ambiciózní vizi, ale tehdy jsme nemohli tušit, do jaké míry bude tato vize sdílená a využívaná velkou částí internetu, píše ve vzpomínkovém článku Josh Aas. Peter Eckersley bohužel zemřel v září 2022.
articles.title: ISRG slaví desáté narozeniny, provozuje nejen certifikační autoritu Let's Encrypt

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Bezpečnostní projekt Turris zveřejnil bezpečnostní zprávu, která shrnuje nejpodstatnější události za duben 2023 a ukazuje trendy v kybernetických útocích na infrastrukturu. Celou zprávu je možné stáhnout na webu projektu [PDF].
articles.title: Telnet je po SMTP stále druhou nejnapadanější službou, říkají data projektu Turris

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Organizace všech velikostí se stále častěji stávají oběťmi ransomwarových útoků a nedostatečně se proti této rostoucí kybernetické hrozbě chrání. Podle nových zjištění studie Veeam 2023 Ransomware Trends Report budou v důsledku ransomwarových útoků zasažena téměř všechna (více než 80 %) data jedné ze sedmi organizací, což poukazuje na značnou mezeru v ochraně.
articles.title: Útočníci se zaměřují na zálohovací úložiště a vynucují si tím zaplacení výkupného

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Minulý týden jsme psali o tom, že vývojáři Fedory zvažují zařazení varianty Onyx mezi oficiální distribuční edice. Jedná se o distribuci s neměnným základem, která staví na Fedora Budgie – ta se nedávno stala oficiální edicí Fedory. Nyní byl tento návrh schválen výborem FESCo (Fedora Engineering and Steering Committee) a stane se tak s vydáním Fedory 39.
articles.title: Fedora Onyx se stane oficiální neměnnou variantou Fedory

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Tržby společnosti Seznam.cz se oproti roku 2021 zvýšily o 5,8 % na necelých 5,93 miliardy korun. Naproti tomu zisky společnosti činily před zdaněním 1,284 miliardy korun, což v meziročním srovnání představuje pokles o 34,5 %. Za snížením zisku stojí nejen zvyšující se náklady související s aktuální ekonomickou situací, ale i významné personální investice, které byly oproti roku 2021 vyšší o necelých 8 %, a změna majetkové struktury společnosti vlivem odštěpení.
articles.title: Společnost Seznam.cz vykázala za rok 2022 tržby ve výši 5,928 miliardy korun

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Zítra je 25. května, takže je Ručníkový den! Tak jestli sasujete toho húpyho Douglase Adamse, tak si zítra rozhodně nezapomeňte ručník a hlavně nepanikařte! Je také dobré přibalit si nezbytného Stopařova průvodce po galaxii, kde se mimo jiné dočtete:
articles.title: Ručníkový den na památku Douglase Adamse

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Z archivu balíčků PyPI byla odstraněna podpora podepisování balíčků pomocí PGP. Projevuje se to tak, že vývojáři sice stále mohou podpisy nahrávat, ale ty budou ignorovány. Dříve přidané podpisy je stále možné stáhnout, ale další už nebudou přidávány. Příslušné části API, například has_sig vždy vracejí  False.
articles.title: PyPI odstraňuje podporu podepisování pomocí PGP

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Bootlin vydala nástroj Snagboot, který uživatelům pomáhá s obnovou zcihlených vestavěných systémů. Obnovení a přeflashování softwarově poškozené základní desky může být zdlouhavý proces. Někdy stačí přepsat SD kartu, ale některá zařízení žádný slot na externí úložiště nemají.

articles.description: Firma VMware po roce vydala nový Photon OS. Vyšel čtvrtletní Alpine Linux. Red Hat aktualizoval Enterprise Linux 8 a 9, následovaly je alternativní sestavení. articles.description: Acer představuje nový Swift Edge 16 s procesory AMD Ryzen řady 7040. České firmy v krizi urychlují digitalizaci. 93 % ransomwarových útoků se zaměřuje na zálohovací úložiště a vynucuje si tím zaplacení výkupného. Moderní řešení pro datacentra od Schneider Electric. CyberSecurity Podcast ProID #11: Obnova organizace po ransomware útoku. Míra zašifrování dat ransomwarem dosáhla nejvyšší úrovně za poslední 4 roky. Se společností AddAI o AI a chatbotech. Dell představuje nejnovější zařízení pro hybridní práci.
